Html:
XML document support is absent in TypeScript and it's IDE plugins and browser editor.

Its will be very useful on large projects when displayed on IntelliSense and tooltips.

 

Thanks.

We are tracking this request with #178 here: http://typescript.codeplex.com/workitem/178.  This covers support for leveraging documentation comments in tooling features generally - all of raw comments, VSDoc comments and JSDoc comments are being considered.
